dialogs.cancel_message: Are you sure you want to cancel the uninstallation?

welcome.title: DevStack Uninstaller
welcome.description: This wizard will remove DevStack from your computer
welcome.app_description: This wizard will guide you through the complete removal process of DevStack from your system.

confirmation.title: Uninstall Confirmation
confirmation.description: Please confirm you want to proceed with removing DevStack
confirmation.warning_title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Attention - This action cannot be undone
confirmation.warning_text: Uninstalling will completely remove DevStack from your system, including:
confirmation.install_not_found_desc: DevStack may not be installed correctly or may have already been removed. Uninstallation will only clean up remaining records and shortcuts.

uninstall_options.title: Uninstall Options
uninstall_options.description: Choose what to remove during uninstallation
uninstall_options.label: Select components to remove:
uninstall_options.user_data_desc: Includes settings, logs, and data files saved by DevStack
uninstall_options.registry_desc: Removes registry keys and installation information
uninstall_options.shortcuts_desc: Removes desktop and Start Menu shortcuts
uninstall_options.path_desc: Removes DevStack path from environment variables
uninstall_options.info: We recommend keeping all options selected for a complete system removal.

ready_to_uninstall.title: Ready to Uninstall
ready_to_uninstall.description: Review the settings and click Uninstall to proceed
ready_to_uninstall.path_selected: ‚úì Will be removed from system PATH

uninstalling.title: Uninstalling
uninstalling.description: Please wait while DevStack is being removed from your system

finished.title: Uninstallation Completed
finished.description: DevStack has been successfully removed from your system
finished.success_message: DevStack has been successfully removed from your system. All selected components have been cleaned.
finished.system_clean: Your system is now free of DevStack.

log_messages.system_path_warning: Warning: Could not remove from system PATH (requires administrator privileges)
